Episodes.Title: Slip of the Tongue
Episodes.Plot: After reuniting at the end of Season One, Hank and Karen decide to pack up and head to New York. As part of the reconciliation, Hank undergoes a grueling vasectomy at Karen's request. Hank has an accident when he confuses a partygoer for Karen. Hank gets arrested for driving under the influence and assaulting an officer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Paula Marshall, Brian Posehn, Pete Wentz

Episodes.Title: The Great Ashby
Episodes.Plot:
Hank finds himself in jail after assaulting a mouthy police officer. Karen, still upset at Hank for his accident at the party, refuses to bail him out.
Meanwhile, Charlie gets fired after his former assistant, Dani, plays the agency president a montage of Charlie?s self-pleasuring office sessions.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Paula Marshall, Alexis Arquette

Episodes.Title: No Way to Treat a Lady
Episodes.Plot: Charlie wants to help Daisy with her porn career, while Hanks starts writing Lew Ashby's biography. Becca has her first day at a private school, while Karen meets Sonja and Julian again.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Judy Greer, Paula Marshall

Episodes.Title: The Raw and the Crooked
Episodes.Plot: Hank proposes to Karen right before a dinner party, to which Mia, Charlie, Marcy, Lew Ashby, Sonja and Julian are invited. Drugs and special circumstances turn the evening in an unexpected direction.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Paula Marshall

Episodes.Title: Vaginatown
Episodes.Plot: In order to distract Hank from his heartbreak, Ashby arranges a sex session with popular, yet incredibly annoying, celebrity chef, Chloe Metz. Charlie takes on a new client who?s eager to land the lead in a porn film called Vaginatown. Charlie meets with the film?s director and secures her the part, but only after investing $100,000 of his own savings.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Meredith Monroe, Hal Ozsan

Episodes.Title: Coke Dick & First Kick
Episodes.Plot: Hank decides to seek out Lew Ashby?s long lost love, Janie Jones. Hank accidentally walks in on Julian going at it with a rocker chick he?s ?mentoring?. Mia spends the day trailed by Rolling Stone reporter Annika Staley. The Runkle residence is transformed into the set of Vaginatown.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Paula Marshall, Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Hal Ozsan, Carly Pope, Vincent Angel

Episodes.Title: In a Lonely Place
Episodes.Plot: Hank attempts to find a love interest for Becca's teacher. Charlie uncovers Marcy's secret which could have fatal effects on their finances.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Ezra Miller, Justine Bateman, Colin Malone

Episodes.Title: Going Down and Out in Beverly Hills
Episodes.Plot: Hank tries to get the truth about Ashby; Karen confronts the record producer; Marcy detoxes at her mother's house; Charlie succumbs to temptation.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Vincent Angell, Paola Turbay, Michaela Watkins

Episodes.Title: La Ronde
Episodes.Plot: Hank turns down an offer of sex which is unthinkable (for him). Karen gives in to Ashby's asking and agrees to date him. Charlie and Daisy have a bonding moment over the film Dirty Dancing, while Marcy is still in rehab.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Paula Marshall, Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick

Episodes.Title: In Utero
Episodes.Plot: Hank awaits test results and reflects on his early days with Karen; Charlie begs Daisy to move out.

Episodes.Title: Blues from Laurel Canyon
Episodes.Plot: Ashby hosts a party to celebrate the publication of Mia's book. Becca is devastated to catch Damien cheating on her.
Episodes.GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Ezra Miller, Hal Ozsan, Carly Pope

Episodes.Title: La Petite Mort
Episodes.Plot: Hank completes his biography of Ashby. Charlie is reduced to working at a car dealership. Sonja gives birth. Karen accepts a job offer back home in New York, forcing Hank and Becca to make painful choices.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paula Marshall, Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Ezra Miller, Michelle Lombardo, Nick Steele
